0.1.name: wordpress/wp-random-feeds
0.1.description:
This plugin help developers to send content posts/categories random to another web applications via feed (rss, rss2, rdf, atom) You can collect this feeds and put content from feeds in another web applications.

New options will be added soon like randomize only custom categories or only blog posts.

Another functions will be added in the next versions of this plugins.
